elements.name: Help
elements.text: With given matching h - Hello, write 'h' and press space to paste "Hello" string.

elements.name: @regresion_pass
elements.text: Issue no longer occurs on [#build]. Closing..

elements.name: @regresion_fail
elements.text: Issue still occurs on [#build]. Reopening with new media.

elements.name: @steps
elements.text:
1. Launch the zxc_y6.Main from Final Deliverable.
2. Load the save from attachment OR progress after act 1.
3. Go to:
{code:java}
 coords
{code}
4. Observe issue.
